name: NewsroomNZBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Get the latest updates from Newsroom, independent, New Zealand-based news and current affairs site. They deliver in-depth storytelling for thinking audiences with an interest in the people, progress, and democracy of Aotearoa. Our team of experienced, award-winning journalists produces quality written and video stories that set the national news agenda and inform intelligent conversations at every level of New Zealand life.

This app is not an offical Newsroom app and uses feeds from Newsroom. All content is copyrighted to Newsroom.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
